app.services

Class TeacherService

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.services.DaoService<ITeacherDao>
      • app.services.TeacherService

  • @Service
public class TeacherService
extends DaoService<ITeacherDao>
    Class as service represents Teacher. In this class contains all possible operations with teacher and should be used for that.
    Author:
    Mateusz Mucha
